titles.title: Vending Machine Safety Act of 2005
To authorize the Consumer Product Safety Commission to issue a consumer product safety rule to prevent injuries to users of vending machines.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 6/14/2005--Introduced. Vending Machine Safety Act of 2005 - Directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to issue a consumer product safety standard for the manufacture and installation of vending machines, particularly those using a lever or crane apparatus to dispense a product. States that such standard may include a requirement for warning labels or signs relating to the use of such machines to prevent injuries to individuals, including children.
